title: Auto-generate runX, openX, XClaude functions
description: Generate launcher functions for each registered project following repo-claude pattern.

acceptanceCriteria.text: For each project, generate: run{Name}(), open{Name}(), {name}Claude()
run{Name}: cd to path, run dev server (bun run dev or npm run dev)
{name}Claude: cd to path, run claude with project MCPs
